content: I'd love to try some of Tokyo's unique food experiences! I actually tried some delicious ramen during my trip, and I'm hooked! I'd definitely want to explore more of the city's ramen scene. As for Tsukiji Fish Market, I've heard it's a must-visit for sushi lovers, but I didn't get a chance to go there last time. Would you recommend going to the inner market or the outer market for a more tourist-friendly experience?
